channel.title: Tdap vaccine on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections
channel.description: Recent content in Tdap vaccine on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections

item.description: Since the 1950s, not a single vaccine against pertussis has been manufactured. Instead, it is always administered as part of a combined vaccine that also includes diphtheria and tetanus. This vaccine, DTP, is a whole-cell pertussis vaccine (plus diphtheria and tetanus). This means that it contains whole bacteria, which have been killed with formalin. While this vaccine has not been used in developed countries since 2001 because of its reactogenicity, it is still used throughout the rest of the world.
